a wise man knows better than to fight when the odds are against him (idiom)

definition: lit. until you reach the Great Wall, you're not a proper person; fig. to get over difficulties before reaching the goal
pinyin: bu4 dao4 Chang2 cheng2 fei1 hao3 han4

definition: a real man doesn't boast about his past achievements (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 han4 bu4 ti2 dang1 nian2 yong3

definition: daring to act and courageous enough to take responsibility for it (idiom)/a true man has the courage to accept the consequences of his actions/the buck stops here
pinyin: hao3 han4 zuo4 shi4 hao3 han4 dang1

definition: daring to act and courageous enough to take responsibility for it (idiom)/a true man has the courage to accept the consequences of his actions/the buck stops here
pinyin: hao3 han4 zuo4 shi4 hao3 han4 dang1

definition: If the father is a hero, the son is a real man. If the father is a reactionary, the son is a bastard. (Cultural Revolution slogan)/fig. like father, like son
pinyin: lao3 zi5 ying1 xiong2 er2 hao3 han4 , lao3 zi5 fan3 dong4 er2 hun2 dan4
containing_words.word: 老子英雄兒好漢，老子反動兒混蛋

definition: heroes

sentences.english: All the heroes in "The Water Margin" are such valiants.
sentences.chinese: 《水滸傳》裏的英雄們都是愛“打抱不平”的好漢。

sentences.english: They said they would rather be outlaws a year in Sherwood Forest.
sentences.chinese: 他們說寧可在謝伍德森林裏當一年綠林好漢。

sentences.english: One hundred men will test today, But only three win the Green Beret.
sentences.chinese: 縱有百條好漢參加考驗，但也僅有三人可贏得綠扁帽。

sentences.english: This wine is like a sleeping potion that kept the men asleep until morning.
sentences.chinese: 那酒就像安眠藥一樣，使那些好漢一直睡到早上。

sentences.english: Liu Hulan is a charlatan, and she lived a great life and died a august afterlife.
sentences.chinese: 劉胡蘭是個女好漢，她生的偉大，死的光彩。

sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold, adversity of strong man.
sentences.chinese: 烈火煉真金，困境出好漢。

sentences.english: In their minds, is the Robin Hood-like bandit hero.
sentences.chinese: 在他們的頭腦裏，強盜就是劫富濟貧的英雄好漢。

sentences.english: But I’m no longer as eager to put the past behind me as I was in the past.
sentences.chinese: 但好漢不提當年勇，提起來好像我還活在過去一樣。

sentences.english: And you'll finally see the truth that a hero lies in you.
sentences.chinese: 最終你會發現，自己纔是真正的英雄好漢。

sentences.english: I'm already a one-hundred-percent real man.
sentences.chinese: 我已經是百分之一百的好漢。

sentences.english: The theme is deep, and it is a song of praise of heroism.
sentences.chinese: 這次會議的主題是深刻的，它是一首讚美的好漢。

sentences.english: There never was a hero who did not have his bounds.
sentences.chinese: 從來就沒有膽大包天的英雄好漢。

sentences.english: He is a fabulous hero in that book.
sentences.chinese: 在那本書中他是個傳奇式的好漢。

sentences.english: Fiddlesticks is one of the better solo lane Champions in the game right now.
sentences.chinese: 預言者是在目前遊戲版本下該當單混線的好漢之一。

sentences.english: They were ninety heroes dressed in mail .
sentences.chinese: 他們一共是九十個穿鎖子甲的英雄好漢。

sentences.english: What is the heaviest thing, ye heroes?
sentences.chinese: 衆位好漢，最重的負擔是什麼？

definition: lit. able to support both heaven and earth/of indomitable spirit (idiom)
hero/fighter/brave strong guy/warrior (in armor)
Brothers!/brethren/dude (colloquial)/brother (diminutive form of address between males)
to have no sense of shame
to uphold justice/to be loyal (to one's friends)/to stick by
to become sworn brothers or sisters/sworn (brothers)
to waste (one's breath, one's energy etc)/to try in vain
to make a fuss about nothing (idiom)
lit. I dare not (accept the honor); fig. I don't deserve your praise/you flatter me
(Tw) from time to time/frequently
might/awe-inspiring authority/impressive
fortunately/luckily
genuine and sincere (idiom)/wholehearted
to say good-bye/to bid sb farewell
to talk idly about important matters (idiom)/to set the world to rights/to pass judgment on everything
brazen
